<p> TextureCoordinate specifies 2D (s,t) texture-coordinate points, used by vertex-based geometry nodes (such as IndexedFaceSet or ElevationGrid) to map textures to vertices (and patches to NURBS surfaces). </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#TextureCoordinate" target="_blank">TextureCoordinate</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html" target="_blank">18 Texturing component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#Concepts" target="_blank">18.2 Concepts</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#Texturecoordinates" target="_blank">18.2.3 Texture coordinates</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#X3DTextureCoordinateNode" target="_blank">18.3.1 X3DTextureCoordinateNode</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/texturing.html#TextureCoordinate" target="_blank">18.4.7 TextureCoordinate</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter18TextureMapping" target="_blank">Chapter 18 Texture Mapping</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter05AppearanceMaterialTextures" target="_blank">Chapter 05 Appearance Material Textures</a>, <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter06GeometryPointsLinesPolygons" target="_blank">Chapter 06 Geometry Points Lines Polygons</a> </li> </ul>
